EmailTemplate.name: Partner Portal Password Reset
EmailTemplate.subject: Your new Partner Portal password
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your password has been reset, please click here to update it:
Reset Password
Have questions? You can also reach us at 844.786.4100 or partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com. We're happy to help. Thanks for joining the Wave, we're happy you're here. - All of us here at BlueWave
BlueWave Partner Support 844.786.4100 | partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com
